amendment.description: An amendment to restore $1.7 million for salaries and expenses of the Federal Election Commission to conduct investigations of 1996 election law violations.

action.text: Mr. Livingston raised a point of order against the Maloney (NY) amendment (A015). Mr. Livingston stated that the amendment proposes an unauthorized appropritation and was, therefore, in violation of House rules. The Chair sustained the point of order.
